li.p: Java, C#, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, JSP, SQL, C++, Shell Scripting, MySQL, CSS, XML, ASPX, Google App Engine, Amazon Web Services, Node.js, SASS Stylesheets.

li.h2: Kuwait Institute for Scientific Research, Shuwaikh

ul.li: Summer Internship at the Kuwait Institute for Scientific Research.
Worked on ongoing projects, I was introduced to Java servlets and their applications.
Final result was to create a servlet that can go through all the data stored in a database and convert that into an image of a Pie Chart or a Bar Chart.
